pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Testing Method to Control Generalized Family-Wise Error Rate and False Discovery Proportion // Collection of stepwise procedures to conduct multiple hypotheses testing. The details of the stepwise algorithm can be found in Romano and Wolf (2007) DOI:10.1214/009053606000001622 and Hsu, Kuan, and Yen (2014) DOI:10.1093/jjfinec/nbu014.
